specifications.Finish: Chemical > Wicking Wicking is a textile treatment that enables fabric to draw moisture or sweat away from the skin and help it evaporate quickly. This keeps the wearer cool and fresh.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Anti-Pilling A treatment reducing loose fibers on a fabric's surface to avoid the formation of little balls, pills, or threads during wearing and laundering. Quick Dry Quick dry is a technical fabric that wicks away sweat and moisture, helping to maintain a cool and fresh feeling. Stain Resistant Stain resistance works by preventing liquids from being absorbed and fine particles from adhering to the fabric. This can be done either by using fibers that naturally resist stains, or by adding a special coating that helps keep stains from sticking. Water Resistant Waterproof is a specially coated fabric that prevents water penetration to a certain degree, though it may not be completely impermeable. This treatment helps protect the wearer or the item from rain and moisture, making it suitable for outerwear, bags, and outdoor gear. 4 Way Stretch A 4-way stretch fabric stretches and recovers both width and lengthwise, allowing it to move naturally with the body and return to its original shape. This provides a comfortable, flexible fit, making it especially suitable for activewear. Sustainability Certification > GRS The Global Recycled Standard is a voluntary product standard for tracking and verifying the content of recycled materials in a final product. The standard applies to the full supply chain and addresses traceability, environmental principles, social requirements, chemical content and labeling. Certification > OEKO-TEXÂ® Oeko-Tex is a registered trade mark, representing the product labels and company certifications issued and other services. Eco-fiber > Recycled Yarn Recycled yarn is a special type of yarn manufactured from waste textiles and other materials. This kind of yarn is created from waste materials, such as plastic bottles, as well as 'textile-to-textile' waste. Recommended Use Activewear, Swimwear, Raincoat, Leggings
